title: I keep seeing Sona nerfs but I never see her played
body: Any reason for this? She's in like 5% in all the games I play in ranked and she's mediocre at best. Why am I always seeing nerfs for her? Is she stomping low elo or something?

The issue with sona is that she's very safe and well-rounded. Her harass is pretty intense given that she also has a very strong heal. Someone like soraka, on the other hand, has a very intense heal but her harass is pretty laughable. Sona Q + empowered auto hits much harder than anything raka can dish out, and this is where the problem lies. 

A bit of an identity crisis within Riot's mentality imo. Supports usually can do one thing real well; utility (blitz, thresh, leona), heal (soraka, sona), or damage (annie, karma, pantheon). Some supports have more than one of these aspects in their kit, like alistar, nami, and sona. Usually, these multi-faceted characters have a major weakness. Alistar's heals are incredibly weak, for example, and his mana costs are through the roof. Sona has low mana costs, a potent heal, a potent (and easy to land) harass, and a utility ult. There's alot going on for her, even if shes not 90% pick/ban tier. Either her harass or her heal should be toned down a tad so that she feels more comparable to the other supports.

Interesting way to look at it! I've generally used the burst-sustain-poke(-disengage) paradigm.
Disengage: Janna
Burst: Leona
Sustain: Soraka
Poke: Sona - except that she's also got excellent sustain. Honestly, I think that Riot should've nerfed her W, but whatever.

----

A categorisation of supports, because I want to: (tell me if I missed any)
Disengage: Janna
Disengage-Burst: Zyra, Braum, Morgana
Burst: Leona, Thresh, Blitzcrank, Annie
Burst-Sustain: Taric, Alistair
Sustain: Soraka
Poke-Sustain: Sona, Nami
Poke-Burst: Karma, Lulu, Zilean, Lissandra?
Zyra also has good poke.

Her W doesn't scale well, and it will OOM a Sona very early on. If you want to contest a Sona and can't navigate the whole - she has some of the lowest defense in the game thing - just find ways to force her to heal. Pre-6, she'll OOM at *light speed* trying to heal, even with mana regen items. .. Through level 10 I'd say, too. For what it heals, it shouldn't have the high cost that it does.

Outside of ARAM she's generally unpopular.  While she was my support of choice for a while, between the rework and potential upcoming changes I just don't see reason to pick her considering the potential matchups bot lane.

But unless folks in high elo are have found her to have some hidden power and are using her extensively, I don't see why she'd be worthy of a nerf bat beating versus someone like fizz or zed.
